title: Homeopathy should have professional accreditation revoked, NHS leaders urge
author: Gareth Iacobucci
description: Senior NHS leaders have called for the UK's largest group of registered homeopaths to have its accreditation revoked amid concerns that some practitioners are spreading misinformation about vaccines. In a letter to the Professional Standards Authority (PSA) for Health and Social Care, NHS England chief executive Simon Stevens and national medical director Stephen Powis expressed "serious concerns" about the possible reaccreditation of the Society of Homeopaths.
